joy: happiness, cheer, delight, pleasure, fun, excitement, gladness
surprise: shock, amazement, wonder, astonishment, disbelief, curiosity
fear: worry, anxiety, nervousness, panic, dread, hesitation, unease
anger: annoyance, frustration, irritation, rage, resentment, agitation
love: care, affection, fondness, warmth, devotion, attachment, admiration
sadness: upset, gloom, unhappiness, disappointment, grief, melancholy
